pageProps.title: Building a Python-based Security Operations Center (SOC)
pageProps.metaDesc: As cybersecurity threats continue to evolve and become more sophisticated, organizations must take a proactive approach to protect their networks and sensitive data. A Security Operations Center (SOC) is a critical component of an effective cybersecurity strategy, providing real-time monitoring, analysis, and response to security incidents. In this article, we'll discuss how to build a Python-based SOC, which can help automate and streamline many of the tasks required to keep your network secure.
